description: Column in a physical data model

data_domain.description: A user-defined data type.  For example, "kWh"

length.description: Length defined for the column data type

nullable.description: Information about whether the column is optional/nullable

default_value.description: A value that is automatically generated when none is provided for this column in a new record

derived.description: Information about whether or not this column is calculated from other columns

generated.description: Information about whether or not the value is auto-generated by the database system

sequence_number.description: The ordinal number of attribute within the entity

notes.description: Free form textual notes that a user can add

name: ibm_physical_model_column
